text: I want to code my blog post template to have the author, topic, title on the left and the featured image on the right. Can anyone help me out. I’m trying to mimic the hero section HubSpot’s own blog posts <https://blog.HubSpot.com/marketing/hard-skills-soft-skills>
Hey there - where are you getting hung up?

I converted a blog listing page template from an old template using the old style of drag and drop templating to a new drag and drop template, but I am not able to remove the modules added by the previous template. Any ideas?
